item.title: 华尔街赌场开门营业，流行语股票占领市场
item.description: 周二，在周三关键的通胀数据公布之前，股市交易时段昏昏欲睡。但在投资界较为隐蔽、投机性较强的角落里，赌场却热闹非凡。【原文：The stock market is having a sleepy trading session Tuesday ahead of Wednesday’s critical inflation data. But in the more obscure, speculative corners of the investing world the casino is rocking.】

item.title: 下一篇 美国银行称日本可能通过出售国债进行干预
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）称，日本未来为支持日元而采取的任何外汇干预措施都可能涉及动用其持有的美国国债。【原文：Any future foreign-exchange intervention by Japan to support the yen would likely involve tapping its holdings of US Treasuries, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 据说 EQT 支持的 Waystar 将在美国首次公开募股中寻求高达 10 亿美元的资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Waystar Holding Corp. 正在寻求在美国首次公开募股中筹集多达 10 亿美元的资金。【原文：Waystar Holding Corp. is seeking to raise as much as $1 billion in its US initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本股市大涨，与日元挂钩的 ETF 在反弹 45% 后重获新生
item.description: 一只剔除了日元走势的日本股票 ETF 正在经历一次大复兴，在创下历史新高的同时突然吸引了大量资金。【原文：A Japan-focused stock ETF that strips out moves in the yen is undergoing a big revival, raking in flows all of a sudden as it hits record highs.】

item.title: 巴西央行行长称将 "100%致力于 "实现 CPI 目标
item.description: 巴西央行国际事务部主任保罗-皮切特（Paulo Picchetti）表示，巴西央行 "百分之百地致力于 "将通胀率控制在目标范围的中间位置，他试图以此安抚投资者，因为他们的长期预期仍比3%的目标高出半个百分点。【原文：Brazil’s central bank is “100% committed” to bringing inflation to the middle of its target range, director of international affairs Paulo Picchetti said, as he seeks to reassure investors whose long-term expectations remain a half-percentage point above the 3% goal.】

item.title: 与摩根士丹利和蓝猫头鹰有关联的基金加入债券销售大军
item.description: 商业发展公司投资的中小型企业通常规模太小或风险太高，银行不愿意贷款给它们，这些公司正在美国蓬勃发展的投资级市场上疯狂借贷。【原文：Business development companies, which invest in small and mid-sized firms typically too small or risky for banks to lend to, are getting in on a borrowing spree in the booming US investment-grade market.】

item.title: 盎格鲁与必和必拓之争在于两位首席执行官为同一愿景而战
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）制定的生存计划与其收购者必和必拓集团（BHP Group）的愿景不谋而合，这两家竞争对手的矿业老板现在正为说服股东相信他们是最合适的人选而展开一场争夺战。【原文：As Anglo American Plc sets out a survival plan that echoes the vision of its suitor BHP Group, the rival mining bosses are now locked in a battle to convince shareholders they are the man for the job.】

item.title: 特易购的肯-墨菲的薪酬翻了一番，达到近 1,000 万英镑
item.description: 由于超市业绩的改善，乐购公司首席执行官的薪酬翻了一番，达到近 1,000 万英镑（1,260 万美元）。【原文：Tesco Plc’s chief executive officer has seen his pay double to almost £10 million ($12.6 million) after an improvement in the supermarket’s performance.】

item.title: 新泽西州 "美国梦 "购物中心第一季度销售额飙升，业绩大增
item.description: 新泽西州 "美国梦 "大型购物中心第一季度的销售额猛增，原因是消费者在繁忙的假日购物期之后表现出了持续的需求。【原文：Sales at New Jersey’s American Dream mega mall soared in the first quarter as consumers demonstrated continued demand following the busy holiday shopping period.】

item.title: 道明银行和加拿大皇家银行数据显示加拿大家庭消费放缓
item.description: 根据加拿大最大的两家银行提供的最新数据，过去两个月加拿大的消费支出继续显示出疲软的迹象。【原文：Consumer spending in Canada has continued to show signs of weakness over the past two months, according to fresh data from the country’s two largest banks.】

item.title: GameStop 拉力赛缺少 2021 Meme 狂潮中的一个关键要素
item.description: GameStop Corp.股价飙升，互联网上对一个被称为 "咆哮的凯蒂猫 "的人议论纷纷。但这一切都让人联想起 2021 年的meme 股狂潮，但当时却缺少了一个关键因素：看涨期权的疯狂买入帮助股价再次飙升 1000%。【原文：GameStop Corp. shares are soaring, and the Internet is abuzz about someone known as ‘Roaring Kitty.’ But for all that’s reminiscent of the meme stock frenzy of 2021, there’s one key element missing from that time: a frenzy of bullish options buying to help pump another 1000% surge.】

item.title: 麦当劳在即将到期前利用高等级市场
item.description: 麦当劳公司（McDonald's Corp.）正在出售债券，据一位分析师称，这可能有助于为今年到期的债务再融资。【原文：McDonald’s Corp. is selling bonds that according to an analyst could help refinance debt due this year.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团抛弃戴比尔斯集团是对陷入困境的钻石市场的沉重打击
item.description: 钻石业已经感受到了热浪。价格下滑、俄罗斯制裁威胁贸易、实验室培育宝石的出现正在侵蚀一些重要的传统市场。【原文：The diamond industry has already been feeling the heat. Prices have slumped, Russian sanctions are threatening trade and the emergence of lab-grown gems is eating into some key traditional markets.】

item.title: 价格疲软，尼日利亚未售石油开始减少
item.description: 在欧洲疲软的拉动迫使一些卖家降低价格之后，尼日利亚本月装船的原油终于显示出开始清仓的迹象。【原文：Nigeria’s crude oil for loading this month is finally showing signs of starting to clear out after a weak pull from Europe forced some sellers to lower prices.】

item.title: 备忘录股票狂热复兴，空头损失逾 10 亿美元
item.description: 本周，在一场意想不到的主题交易复兴中，押注于一些最严重缩水股票的交易员们正在蒙受纸面损失。【原文：Traders betting against some of the most heavily-shorted stocks are racking up paper losses in an unexpected revival of the meme trade this week.】

item.title: 阿根廷人涌向银行，抵押贷款市场在米莱伊领导下苏醒
item.description: 随着哈维尔-米莱总统上台以来的利率下调开始唤醒沉睡六年之久的住房贷款市场，阿根廷人正争先恐后地前往银行申请抵押贷款。【原文：Argentines are rushing to banks to apply for mortgages as interest-rate reductions since President Javier Milei took power begin to wake the home-loan market from a six-year slumber.】

item.title: 波兰被迫在房市繁荣中反思廉价房贷计划
item.description: 波兰对向蓬勃发展的房地产市场注入新的刺激政策是否真的是个好主意的问题变得更加谨慎。【原文：Poland is turning more cautious on whether it’s really a good idea to pump fresh stimulus into a booming housing market.】

item.title: 太阳电力公司股价因 "备忘录 "狂潮飙升，利空因素增加
item.description: 被严重做空的 SunPower 公司股票被卷入 "备忘录股 "热潮，使这家太阳能公司创下历史最大涨幅。【原文：Heavily shorted SunPower Corp. shares have been caught up in the meme-stock frenzy, sending the solar power company toward its biggest gain on record.】

item.title: 必和必拓称盎格鲁投资者必须根据执行记录做出决定
item.description: 必和必拓集团首席执行官迈克-亨利（Mike Henry）说，投资者必须决定是他的团队还是英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的竞争对手团队最有能力从各自的重组计划中实现价值。【原文：BHP Group Chief Executive Officer Mike Henry said investors must decide whether his team or the rival one at Anglo American Plc is best positioned to deliver value from their respective restructuring plans.】

item.title: 美国通货紧缩停滞不前，市场 "支点党 "看似岌岌可危
item.description:
‘It is a time for caution because everything is so stretched,’ FS Investments’ Rhame says

】

item.title: 肯-格里芬等着看特朗普的副总统人选再支持他
item.description: 肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）是全美共和党候选人中最多产的支持者之一，他表示，在支持唐纳德-特朗普竞选总统之前，他将静观其变。【原文：Ken Griffin, one of the most prolific supporters of Republican candidates across the US, said he’s waiting to see who Donald Trump picks as his running mate before backing his candidacy for president.】

item.title: 金融高管帮助加拿大保守党在金钱游戏中击败特鲁多
item.description: 加拿大的企业巨头们正在帮助加拿大保守党筹集资金，以推翻总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）。【原文：Canada’s corporate titans are helping the country’s Conservative Party build a financial war chest to oust Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, as frustration grows among business leaders about the country’s economic performance.】

item.title: 欧佩克+重启关于成员国石油生产能力的激烈辩论
item.description: 欧佩克+"正在再次努力解决其成员国实际能够抽取多少石油的棘手问题，这个问题给该组织稳定世界市场的努力带来了风险。【原文：OPEC+ is once again grappling with the thorny question of how much oil its members are actually capable of pumping, an issue that poses risks for the group’s efforts to stabilize world markets.】

item.title: 地缘政治紧张局势加剧，淡马锡寻求国内投资
item.description: 淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）将重点投资于大型、以国内业务为主的公司，以规避与全球一触即发的地缘政治紧张局势相关的风险。【原文：Temasek Holdings Pte will focus on investing in companies with large, domestic-focused businesses as it seeks to avoid risks tied to simmering geopolitical tensions around the world.】

item.title: 彼得-蒂尔的风险投资公司通过投资 Polymarket 支持选举投注
item.description: 彼得-蒂尔（Peter Thiel）的风险投资公司创始人基金（Founders Fund）正将赌注押在最大的加密预测市场之一上，尽管美国的一个重要监管机构正加紧努力限制此类平台上的活动。【原文：Peter Thiel’s venture-capital firm Founders Fund is betting on one of the largest crypto-based prediction markets even as a key US regulator steps up efforts to restrict activity on such platforms.】

item.title: 数十亿资金退出主题 ETF，交易者不再追捧热门主题
item.description: 在 "一切皆有可能 "的大流行时代蓬勃发展之后，一种曾经风靡一时的投资策略正在重新失宠，一些小众 ETF 提供商也因此受到冲击。【原文：After booming in the anything-goes pandemic era, a once-fashionable investment strategy is falling out of favor anew, hitting some niche ETF providers along the way.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称欧洲应更大胆地削减赤字
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）负责该地区的最高官员表示，欧洲应利用其稳固的经济复苏来更快地减少预算缺口。【原文：Europe should use its solid recovery to reduce budget shortfalls more quickly, according to the International Monetary Fund’s top official for the region.】

item.title: 在与监管机构的建设性会谈中，BFF 首席执行官对派息充满信心
item.description: BFF Bank SpA 首席执行官马西米利亚诺-贝林赫里（Massimiliano Belingheri）相信，在意大利银行的调查结束后，该银行将能够恢复其赔付政策。【原文：BFF Bank SpA’s Chief Executive Officer Massimiliano Belingheri is confident the bank will be able to resume its payout policy after the conclusion of the Bank of Italy’s probe.】

item.title: 沙特经济 "过热 "担忧成为计划制约因素
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯希望在引导投资时避免使经济过度发展，其目标是使国家摆脱对石油的依赖。【原文：Saudi Arabia wants to avoid sending the economy into overdrive as it channels investments with the goal of pivoting the nation away from oil dependency.】

item.title: 科恩称高利率阻碍投资者冒险
item.description: 曾担任美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普首席经济顾问的加里-科恩说，长期的高利率阻碍了投资者承担风险，因为他们选择将资金投入更安全的国债。【原文：An extended period of elevated interest rates is preventing investors from taking risks as they choose to put funds in safer government debt instead, said Gary Cohn, who served as chief economic adviser to former President Donald Trump.】
